terms.definition: A specialized form of writing that explains complex technical information in a clear, accessible manner for specific audiences.
A document that provides step-by-step instructions on how to use a product, software, or system effectively.
A numerical measurement that indicates how easy or difficult a text is to read and understand, often calculated using formulas that consider sentence length and word complexity.
Subject Matter Expert - a person with deep knowledge and expertise in a specific technical field or domain who provides authoritative input on content accuracy.
Simplified Technical English - a controlled language standard that uses restricted vocabulary and grammar rules to improve clarity and translatability of technical documents.
A comprehensive document that provides detailed information about features, functions, or specifications for quick lookup and consultation.
An authoritative document that presents detailed information, research findings, or solutions to specific technical problems or industry challenges.
Comprehensive written materials that explain how to install, configure, use, and troubleshoot a product or software application.
A structured document that provides step-by-step instructions or explanations for completing technical tasks or understanding complex concepts.
The specific group of users or readers for whom documentation is written, defined by their technical expertise, role, and information needs.
A writing style where the subject performs the action, making sentences clearer and more direct than passive voice constructions.
A centralized web-based platform that organizes and provides access to all technical documentation, guides, and resources for users.
Educational material designed to teach specific skills or knowledge through structured lessons and exercises in a technical subject.
Detailed documentation that covers installation, operation, maintenance, and troubleshooting procedures for a specific product.
Written material that explains complex technical concepts, procedures, or information in a structured and accessible format.
